scripts.generate_report:rest: source env.sh  &&  npm run test:rest -- --output rest_report.json
scripts.generate_report:temporal: source env.sh  &&  npm run test:temporal -- --output temporal_report.json
scripts.generate_ui_report:rest: source env.sh  && TARGET_PATH=${TARGET_PATH_REST} artillery run test_fibonacci/config.yaml --record --key ${ARTILLERY_API_KEY}
scripts.generate_ui_report:queue: source env.sh  && TARGET_PATH=${TARGET_PATH_QUEUE} artillery run test_fibonacci/config.yaml --record --key ${ARTILLERY_API_KEY}
